an5.210:1.1: “Mendicants, there are these five drawbacks of falling asleep unmindful and unaware.
an5.210:1.3: You sleep badly and wake miserably. You have bad dreams. The deities don’t protect you. And you emit semen.
an5.210:1.4: These are the five drawbacks of falling asleep unmindful and unaware.
an5.210:2.1: There are these five benefits of falling asleep mindful and aware.
an5.210:2.3: You sleep at ease and wake happily. You don’t have bad dreams. The deities protect you. And you don’t emit semen.
an5.210:2.4: These are the five benefits of falling asleep mindful and aware.”
